reviewText: Fantastic insight and instruction.  A clear approach to overcoming violence with superior violence.

I am a Krav Maga Instructor in Florida and this is a great video, well done easy for everybody to understand. Ryan will take you through the process that "defense is for suckers" how to use the energy off your attacker and mount an offensive attack to eliminate the threat.  Your fight game will improve.  Recommend this to everyone!
